traits.name: Rally the Troops
entries: As a bonus action, the githyanki can magically end the {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions on itself and each creature of its choice that it can see within 30 feet of it.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The githyanki makes three greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage plus 17 (5d6 damage) psychic damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
